Detailed Description

This is an interface for a binary input stream.

Really simple does-it-all interface.

template<class TYPE>
void BinaryIStream::extractRaw ( TYPE &  t  )  [inline]

Inverse operation of insertRaw() above, i.e.

extract some data from the stream, bypassing endian conversions.

virtual const void* BinaryIStream::retrieve ( int  nBytes  )  [pure virtual]

This method retrieves the input number of bytes from this stream.

The returned data is still owned by the stream, so the caller is not responsible for freeing it.

Parameters:
nBytes Number of bytes to retrieve.
Returns:
Pointer to returned data.

Implemented in MemoryOStream, and MemoryIStream.
